Name: Deep Space Scoundrel
About the game: Deep Space Scoundrel is a rogue-like space adventure where you use a variety of classic arcade mechanics to explore the universe, customize your ship, land at spaceports, and fraternize with other aliens and low-lives. Use a galaxy of customizable guns and ship parts to build the perfect battle unit and blast through the epic armies hunting you down.
